div.p:
Curia burgi de Abirdene tenta ibidem coram preposito et ballivis eiusdem xxij die Januarij anno Domini et cetera
lxxviijuo

quo die Johannes gregory sepe vocatus ad comparendum veluti premunitus fuit per seriandum de
mandato prepositi Non comparuit vnde adiudicatus fuit in amerciamento propter suam contempcionem et absenciam et cetera

Eodem die per prepositum et consilium concessus fuit discreto viro domino Andree thomson vnius
burgensis futurus faciend' ad libitum suum quicumque ipsum presentauerit pro suis laboribus
in organorum laudibus factis et faciendis ad cultum dei omnipotentis vberius venerandi

Curia burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio coram preposito et ballivis eiusdem xxvj die Januarij
anno predicto

the same day patrik badenach on the behalf of Anny his dochtir the spous' vmquhile
of Androw clerk protestit in the court before the Aldirman and balyeis that thai suld nocht tak tode
cide nor determyn before thaim in this court ony action' twicheand the clame made be
Richard hil of certane wax / sen the determinacion tharof pertenis to the spirituale law as he
said / And that quhat thing war done tharein suld turn the said Anny and the executoris of
the said androw clerk til no preiudice

Item the same dai it wes concludit and deliuerit be ane sworn assise of worthy burgessis
and pronuncit be Alexander of chavmer of murchil forspekar' of the sammyn assise / that Johne
stevinson be his awne promyt suld deliuer til Richard hil thre pruys' stanis
of walx clamyt be him with the quhilk the said John' intromettit in the tyme on the
behalf of Anny the spous' of vmquhile Androw clerk / witnes' of this deliuerens befo
re Androw scherar' aldirman Alexander rede thom of chamer twa of the balyeis Alexander trail macolm
mowat patrik andirson William cryne Duncan straloch seriand and vthiris diuersis

Eodem die prepositus assignauit diem veneris proximo post festum purificacionis beate marie virginis pro
responso Dauido penes actum productum ex parte Alexandri rolland in quadam causa inter eum et Adam
hervy partibus et suis prelocutoribus apud act' premunit'

Item magister thomas stane capellanus altaris beati Stephani ex vna / et Macolmus mow
at curator Johannis de Kintor filius et heredis quondam gilberti Kintor et Robertus prat partibus ex
altera penes certos annuales redditus clamatos de terra quondam Stephani Johannis submise
runt se ordinacioni et decreto prepositi et communis consilij huius burgi / et ad hoc faciendum prepositus assigna
uit eisdem partibus vigiliam purificacionis beate marie proximo futuro

Curia ballivorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio per ballivos eiusdem xxviij die Janua
rij anno supradicto

Inquisicionis nomina Johannes Vaus Johannes de Kintor gilbertus de camera Adam de craufurde
Macolmus mowat Jacobus craik Alexander trail Ricardus hil Johannes stewart Walterus
piot Willelmus necolson Johannes litstar Simon de gardin Jacobus clerk Willelmus de Kintor
Qui Jurati dicunt quod quondam magister Andreas crab frater germanus magistri themannj crab latoris
presencium obiit vltimo vestitus et sasitus ut de feodo ad pacem et fidem dominj nostri Regis de vno annuo
redditu vj s' et viij d' annuatim leuando et precipiendo de terra quondam Duncanj clat Jacente in vico superiore
ecclesie parrochiali huius burgi ex parte australi eiusdem vici inter terram Roberti club ex parte occidentali ex vna
et venellam regiam ex parte orientali partibus ex altera Et de xl d' annuj redditus de terra
Roberti club Jacente ex eadem parte dicti vici inter terram quondam Duncani clat ex parte orientali et terram
dicti quondam magistri Andree ex parte occidentali Et de quadam terra sine tenemento cum pertinencijs Jacente in
dicto vico superiori ecclesie ex eadem parte australi inter terram Roberti club ex orientali parte ex vna
et terram Alexander howison ex parte occidentali partibus ex altera Et de quondam annuo redditu x s' annuatim
leuando de terra quondam Nicholai fichet Jacente in vico nauium dicti burgi ex parte boriali eiusdem
vici inter terram domini forbes ex parte occidentali et terram margarete cryne ex parte orientali
Et quod dictus magister themannus est legittimus et propinquior heres eiusdem quondam magistri Andree fratris
suj de dicta terra et annuis redditibus cum pertinencijs Et quod est legittime etatis Et quod dicta terra
cum pertinenciis valet nunc per annum solutis annuis redditibus inde debitis xx s' et tantum valu
it tempore pacis Et de valore annuorum redditum predictorum satis patet Et dicti terra et annuj
redditus cum pertinencijs tenentur in capite de domino nostro Rege per seruicium burgale de eadem terra
Et quod dicta terra et annuj redditus nunc existunt in manibus ballivorum dicti burgi ex Resignacione ho
dierna die facta per Alisonam liel matrem dicti magistri themannj in fauorem eiusdem / que fuit in
coniuncta infeodacione terre et annuorum redditum predictorum et cetera

The first dai of februare the yer' of god et cetera lxxviij yeris / before the Aldirman balye
is and consale of this burgh Johne of knollis offerit til Macolm mowat as curat til
Jok of Kintor son' and ayr of vmquhile gilbert of Kintor and to the said childe and his ner
rest frendis than beand present x merkis worth of annuel pertening til quhilum the said gilbert
and now to the said John' of knollis gif it ples' thaim toredeme the same giffand him
the sowme that thai war presit for til him et cetera

Item the said John' of Knollis the same tym protestit that for samekil a he has of before tyme
made with diuers' personis certane finance and eschange and gevin his obligacion tharupon the
quhilkis he offeris him redy tofre and content al persons of al clame anent his saidis obligacion
in sa fer as he is haldin todo of law and reson' that the withhalding of his obligacionez
suld nocht turn him to na preiudice in tyme tocum

Item the samyn dai the aldirman at the deliuerens of the consale has ordand Alexander of chavmer and alexander
menyes tocum before him and the consale on friday nixt tocum tohere thare deliuerance in
the action debatabil betuix the saidis parties anent ane half nettis fisching of the Raike
pertening vmquhile til William bonar' / And that nane of thaim suld intromet tharwith bot
lat it remayn vnstrekit in the menetym

Eodem die Alexander chavmer de murchil in presencia prepositi ballivorum et consulum inuenit Dauid coli
son' plegium legalem pro eo / quod Alexander menyeis erit indempnes pro ipso et parte sua
aliter quam per viam Juris Et eodem modo gilbertus vaus deuenit plegius legalis pro
Alexandro menyeis de indempnitate alexander de camera aliter quam Jura volunt

Item eodem die thomas litstar primo die vocatus per Duncanum straloch seriandum ad sectam
thome chepman responsurus ut patet in extensione plegij / non comparuit quare precipitur seriendo
capere districtum et cetera et premunire eundem ad curiam balliuorum tenendam hodie ad xvnam
tanquam secundo die processus

Curia burgi de Aberdene tenta in pretorio per ballivos eiusdem v die februarij
Anno Domini et cetera lxxviij /

quo die Andreas branch inuenit Johannem Wormot plegium
legalem pro eo quod Willelmus moyses et Alexander nachty et partes sue erunt indemp
nes de ipso et parte sua aliter quam per viam Juris

Item Alexander nachty inuenit Robertum blindsel plegium legalem pro eo quod andree branch et
pars sua erunt indempnes de eo et parte sua aliter quam Jura volunt

Eodem die prepositus de auisiamento et deliberacione consilij posuit in dilacione ex certis raciona
bilibus causis decisionem et responsum certificacionis presentate per Alexandrum menyeis in quadam causa inter
alexandrum rolland et Adam hervy penes vnam obligacionem vsque ad diem veneris in prima
integra ebdomada quadragesime proximo futuro cum consensu prefati Ade

The same dai the aldirman and the consale has fundin that maistir thomas stane
chaplan of Sanct stevynis altar' has spendit apon' the Reparacion and
bigging of the land of quhilum Stevyn' Johneson' pertening to the said
altar and chaplan of the sammyn the some' of ten pundis and ten s' et cetera

Sexto die februarij anno Dominj et cetera lxxviij coram preposito et consulibus Alexander rede inuenit
Dauid mathoson plegium legalem pro eo / quod Robertus de culan et pars sua erunt indempnes
de eo et parte sua aliter quam per viam juris Et eodem modo Johannes de Knollis deuenit plegius
legalis pro Roberto culan de indempnitate Alexandri rede ut supra

The samyn dai ser Robert leis on the behalf of Alexander menyes protestit that the aldirman
balyeis and consel suld nocht attemp nor do in contrar the said Alexander anent ane half
nettis fisching of the Raik pertening til quhilum William bonar' and now to the said
alexander menyeis as he sais be reson' of tak avouand it with the perel of law sen
thai ar na Jugis that matir as he allegis / the quhilk gif thai did / that it sulde
nocht turne the said alexander til na preiudice in tyme tocum

The samyn dai the Aldirman balyeis consel and communite beand present for the tym of the quhilkis
the namis folowis that is tosay Androw scherar' aldirman thomas of chavmer alexander rede twa of
the ballies John' of Knollis Robert blindsel Dauid symson Robert of culan John' the vaus'
John' Wormot Edmond lowson William the hay Dauid mathoson Alexander the hay Macolm
mowet Dauid Kintor Alexander scrogis gilbert morison William blindsel eldar alexander trail
and Adam androson / auisitly has concludit ordanit and deliuerit / that the assedacion last
made of the wattiris and landis of his burgh of Abirdene be rewlit and sene be
the sex personis that made the said assedacion' and be nane vthiris vnto the tyme that
thai vj persons ordand and mak it expedient tobe done And this is ordanit as said
is be the aldirman and consale with the consent of the communite beand present for the tyme et cetera

Curia legalis burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio per balliuos eiusdem viijo die februa
rij anno predicto /

quo die Walterus pyot fatebatur se debere duas barellas fari
ne siliginis Roberto senyour vnde precipitur eidem ad fatisfaciendum dictas ij barellas dicto
Roberto infra terminum Juris
Eodem die andreas branch in amerciamento pro perturbio ville contra Willelmum moyses

Item eodem die Willelmus lutar assignauit aquam suam de le pot videlicet dimidium rethis
eiusdem sibi assedato per communitatem huius burgi / Mariorie branch sponse sue et Da
uid howy filio eiusdem sponse pro omnibus terminis sue assedacionis / quam quondam marioriam et
Dauid howy predicti / prepositus et consules admiserunt assignatos dicti Willelmi ad
aquam predictam secundum tenorem et formam assedacionis aquarum huius burgi inde confect'

The xj dai of februar' the yer' et cetera lxxviij the aldirman be the decret of the consel
has assignit til Anny the spous of vmquhile Androw clerk and til patrik badenach
hir fadir on hir behalf as he that becom souerte and fand caucion for hir tovndirly
the law / monundai cum viij dais tilanswer' til the borgh strekit be Alexander rede
in the name and on the behalf of John' stevynson that is tosay that the said Anny
aw to free the said John' of thre pruys' stan' of wax optenit apon him be Ri
chard hil and wrangis that scho dois it nocht et cetera

xiijo die februarij anno predicto coram thoma de camera vno balliuorum Johannes de lammynton
tanquam debitor pro Alexandro fynlauson de l s' debitis Roberto blindsel de terminis
retroactis ordinatur ad satisfaciendum eidem Roberto de dictam summa debito nomine
quo supra infra quindenam futuram quicquid Johannes detulit Juramento philippi Dunbrek seriandi vtrum
deuenit debitor aut non / et idem philippus Juravit coram preposito et balliuis quod deuenit debitor ut supra

the samyn dai patrik badenach is oblist to the aldirman and consale / on the behalf
of Anny his doghtir the spous' of vmquhile Androw clerk and now spous' til Wil
goldsmyth / that at the hame cuming of the said William or within viij dais thareftir at
the ferrest / he sal mak and ger thaim vndirly the determinacion and deliuerence of
certane personis tobe sworne anent the debate of thre pruys' stanis of wax
clamyt be Richard hil and tobe endit within the said viij dais

Curia burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio per balliuos eiusdem xv die mensis et annj
predictorum

quo die Thomas litstar secundo die vocatus ad sectam thome chepman
Non comparuit Ideo precipitur seriendo capere districtum de eodem ad valorem viij s' et pre
munire ipsum ad curiam ballivorum tenendam hodie ad xvnam tanquam ad tercium diem placitj

Eodem die Alexander fynlauson' tanquam primo die sepe vocatus responsurus plegio per
andream lowson' super eodem extenso in manum Duncanj straloch seriendi pro iniusta
detencione xxti s' cum mariori ab ipso andrea non comparuit vnde precipitur seriendo
quod capiat districtum a dicto alexandro et quod premuniat eundem responsurus hodie ad octo
dies tanquam 2m diem processus

Item eodem die Agnes cumyng filia quondam Andree cumming burgensis huius burgi coram preposito
et ballivis protribunali sedentibus fatebatur se recepisse per Andream branche quinque mar
cas vsualis monete xvj d' minus in partem solucionis annuj redditus per ipsam eidem An
dree vendit' de quadam terra Jacente in vico inferiori ecclesie huius burgi sibi Jure
hereditario contingen' et cetera

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xvj die februarij anno Domini
Mo iiijco lxxviijuo

quo die vxores Johannis fichet in vico nauium Johannis symson et
Willelmi ranyson' amerciantur per concessiones proprias pro infrictione communis ordinacionis in propinacione
lagene ceruisie pro xij d'
Marioria sponsa Johannis Irvyn in amerciamento similiter pro vendicione ceruisie xij d'

xvj die mensis et annj predictorum consilium ordinavit prepositum ad satisfaciendum Jacobo cumming
de vj s' viij d' sibi aban' per prepositum et consules huius burgi promissis ex parte Willelmi quelp /
et hoc de pecunia recipienda pro libertate cuiuscumque burgensis proximi futuri faciendi

The xix dai of februar' the yer' of god et cetera lxxviii yeris Comperand' in Juge
ment before the Aldirman ballies and consale of the burgh of Abirdene Thomas giffard
son' and ayr of vmquhile Wilyam giffard burges of Abirdene / constitute and ordanit
ane venerabil fadir in crist Williame Abbot of Dere his verra lauchful as
signay vnreuocabil tolowis' redeme and outred ane tenement liand in the
castelgate on the north syde of the sammyn out of the handis of Robert blinde
sel his ayris or his assignais / the quhilk tenement the said Robert blindsele inha
bitis / Sowmes of siluer toperoffir deliuer and pay eftir the tenour and forme of the Reuer
sion' and evidentis made tharwpon State and possession' of the said land and tenement
til ask tak and ressaue And resignacion tharof in the balyeis handis tomak In
fourme of law And generaly al vthir thingis in the redeming of the said land
todo that he mycht do in propir person et cetera

The samyn dai It wes determynit and deliuerit be the Aldirman and the maist part of
the consale of this burgh that alsfer as Androw brekach may sufficiantly preve
or mak gude before the aldirman or balyeis of this burgh that he gef siluer til
quhilum Dauid bog toware til him in saip and haw threde / and that gif sik
gudis be cumin hame / the spous' of vmquhile the said Dauid and Richard hen
rison now beand handfast with hir salmak him rekning and payment tharof
Secundly alsfer as the said Androw may preve as said is that he deliuerit
til vmquhile the said Dauid of ony vthir his gudis or that the said Dauid
intromettit with ony vthir gudis of his / thai sal vndirly and byde at the law of
this burgh

Item the said dai before the aldirman balyeis and consale maistir Alexander of culan
parson of owyn protestit on the behalf of the executouris of quhilum Dauid
bog / that the said deliuerence twicheing the clame of Androw brekach suld turne
thaim til na preiudice in tyme cuming sen the determinacion tharof pertenis to the spiritua
le law as he allegis / wpon' the quhilk he producit and schew certane doutis
and resonis of law in write red in presence of the aldirman balyeis and consale forsaid

The same dai eftir none Dauid colison as procuratour for matho fichet tutour til
Jok stevyn sone and ayr of vmquhile Richard stevyn and for the said childe on
the ta part / and John' currour on the behalf of Marion' stevyn his spous' than
beand present on that othir part anens al clames actionis and debatis movit be
the said Dauid apon the behalf of the said Jok stevyn againis the said marion'
and in like wis' be the said marion' and hir husband aganis Dauid colison in
the name and on the behalf of the said Jok stevyn / ar purely and simply summit
tit til Androw scherar' aldirman Alexander rede ane of the balyeis John' Wormot and androw
murray eldar burgez of Abirdene arbitrouris chosin for the decision' and determinacion of
the saidis clames questionis and debatis / the quhilkis arbitouris ar sworn the gret
aith lely and treuly todecide and determyne the saidis actiones and clames as law
wil eftir thar conscience and knaulage / and til ende and gif furth thare decrete
be Sonday cum viij dais And in like wise the saidis parties ar oblist and sworn
til vndirly and fulfil thare determinacion and deliuerence inviolably et cetera

The xx dai of februar' the yer' et cetera lxxviij yeris thomas scrogis presentit to the aldirman and
balyeis in presence of the consale our soueran lordis lettres of the quhilkis the tenour eftir folowis
James be the grace of god king of Scottis To the aldirman and balyeis of our burgh of Abir
dene greting For samekil as it is menyt til ws be our louit thomas scrogis burges
of our said burgh that quhare William lesly burges of our burgh of Dunde / boucht fra him
certain tymbre and vthir merchandis' pertening to him And William moyses and thomas chapman
burgesis of our said burgh of Abirdene / the quhilkis William moyses and thomas chapman
purpos' tovex the said thomas scrogis and opteyn befor you vpon him thair partis
of the somez' awing be the said William lesly / nochtwithstanding that the samyn thomas scrogis
has gottin na payment tharof And the said William lesly that is awand the said somez'
is in orkenay and at his cuming hame is strenyeable for the said somez' and man
pay thaim eftir the tenor of the decret and deliuerance gevin tharvpon be the lordis of oure
consale Oure wil is heirfor and we charge you straitly and commandis that ye procede
nocht again the said thomas scrogis in the said matir / bot that he be vnvexit or distrob
lit therfor' vnto the cummyng of the said William lesly oute of orkenay that pay
ment may be had and recouerit for him and thaim of the said somez' And this ye lef
nocht vndone vndir al pain and charge that eftir may folou Deliuering thir our lettres
be you sene and vndirstandin again to the berar' / gevin vndir our Signet at Edinburgh
the x dai of februar' And of our Reigne the xix yer'
per S d N Regem / Scheuez
James R

Eodem die Willelmus blindsel iunior presentavit thome de camera et Johanni stevynson duobus
ballivorum huius burgi vnam litteram regiam sub signeto preposito et ballivis huius burgi direct' ad
compellendum et distringendum certas personas earumque terras possessores et bona deben'
aliquas summas pecunie et piscarum per suas obligaciones aut alias quouismodo eidem Willelmo prout
in huiusmodi litteris plenius continetur quarum quorundam litterarum predicti ballivi dixerunt quod facient debi
tam execucionem in omnibus iuxta tenorem earundem et mandati Regis

Curia burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio coram preposito et ballivis eiusdem xxvto die
mensis et anni predictorum

the samyn dai It wes ordanit and deliuerit be ane assise that thomas scrogis sal
deliuer and pay til ser William Donaldson chavmerlan to my lorde of Abirdene xl s'
quhilkis he gaf to the said thomas on the behalf of my lorde of abirdene apon the
frauchting of his bote northwert to fyndak for the hame bringing of certane
tymbre

Item the assise fyndis murtho glenmalvin dettour til content William blindsel yungare
twa pety quartaris of salt et cetera

Curia burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio coram preposito et ballivis eiusdem xxvj die februarij anno
Domini et cetera lxxviijuo

quo die subscripti electi fuerunt in Inquisicionem videlicet Alexander howison Dauid
symson gilbertus vaus gilbertus de camera Jacobus cumyng Johannes Wormot Willelmus Kintor
andreas murra senior alexander trail Johannes Stewart gilbertus leche Willelmus moore et Willelmus
androson burgenses dicti burgi Qui Jurati dicunt quod quondam magister Willelmus fratour frater
Johannis fratour' latoris presencium obiit vltimo vestitus et sasitus ut de feodo ad pacem et
fidem domini nostri Regis de vno annuo redditu xiij s' et iiijor d' vsualis monete scocie
exeunt' de terra sine tenemento Alexandri goldsmyth cum pertinenciis iacente in vico furcarum dicti burgi
ex parte orientali eiusdem vici inter terram hered' quondam Jacobi andree ex parte boriali
ex vna et terram Dauid achnahuf ex parte australi occidentali partibus ex altera et communem viam re
giam versus oriens et occidens / Et quod dictus annuo redditu cum pertinenciis et quod est
legittime etatis et de valore dicti annuj redditus satis patet Et quod tenetur in capi
te de domino nostro Rege in libero burgagio / et quod nunc existit in manibus domini nostri
Regis legittime per se ipsum causa dicti quondam magistri Willelmi et a tempore obitus eiusdem
per spacium dimidij annj uel eocirca in defectu veri heredis Jus suum minime prosequentis

Eodem die alexander de camera seriandus et thomas symson adiudicabatur videlicet eorum
quilibet in amerciamento curie pro iniusta perturbacione adinuicem prout repertum fuit et pronunciatum
per assisam et emendabit alter alteri ad visum proborum virorum

Item the samyn dai William more and Dauid howison' ar becumin borch for Dauid
Duncan til thomas prat oblisand thaim be the faith of thar bodijs tocontent and pay til
the said thomas anent the said Dauy Duncan fyve pundis of vsual money of scot
land betuix this and Witsonday nixt tocum and sex barellis of meil free the fraucht
beand pait sa that thai salbe deliuerit til him fraucht free betuix this and lammes
nixt eftir folouand the making of this write And falyeand of the payment of the saidis
vj barrellis of meil betuix this and lammes as said is / thai ar oblist in like wise as of be
for / that thai sal deliuer and pay to the said thomas prat for ilke barrel being vnpa
it xij s' of vsual money at the said terme of lammes but ony langar delay
fraude or gile et cetera And Robert blindsel is oblist be the faith of his body
tokepe Wil more skathles anent thom prat of the said borowgang and Dauid Dun
can is oblist in like wise be the fath of his body tokepe Robert blindsel skathles et cetera
Curia ballivorum tenta in pretorio die prima mensis marcij Anno Dominj et cetera lxxviij /

quo die thomas
litstar tanquam tercio die vocatus ad sectam thome chepman aut eius procuratoris / Non comparuit
Ideo precipitur Duncano straloch seriando capere districtum de dicto thoma litstar et cetera et premunire
eundem responsurus hodie ad quindenam tanquam quartum et diem peremptoriam huius processus

the same dai the bailyeis has assignit til John' of culan this dai xv dais til an
swere as law wil til the borch strekit on him be William more for the wrang
wis' intrometting with a barel of awlme vndir the said Williamis merk

Item eodem die alexander trail primo die vocatus ad sectum Johannis lammynton' pro iniusta detencione v s'
Non comparuit vnde precipitur philippo Dunbrek seriando capere districtum et cetera
